br.com.allin.mobile.pushnotification

Class Util

  • java.lang.Object
    • br.com.allin.mobile.pushnotification.Util

  • public class Util
extends java.lang.Object
    Class that contains common methods that will be used throughout the library.

    • Method Detail

      • isNullOrClear

        public static boolean isNullOrClear(java.lang.String value)
        Checks whether the string value is null or empty string.
        Parameters:
        value - String to be checked.
        Returns:
        If the string value is null or empty, returns true. Otherwise, returns false.

      • checkPlayServices

        public static boolean checkPlayServices(android.content.Context context)
        Verifies that the device has Google Play Services (APK) installed.
        Parameters:
        context - Application context.
        Returns:
        If the device has the apk Google Play Services installed returns true. Otherwise, returns false.

      • getAppVersion

        public static int getAppVersion(android.content.Context context)
        Return the application version. The version is set in the key android:versionCode of AndroidManifest.xml.
        Parameters:
        context - Application context.
        Returns:
        Application version.

      • isNetworkAvailable

        public static boolean isNetworkAvailable(android.content.Context context)
        Verifies that the device is connected to any network (WiFi or Mobile). Attention: This method only checks if the device is connected, there is no connectivity (eg does not check for available WiFi networks or if there is 3G signal).
        Parameters:
        context - Application context.
        Returns:
        If the device is connected returns true. Otherwise, returns false.

      • getToken

        public static java.lang.String getToken(android.content.Context context)
        Returns the AllIn token saved in the key all_in_token. The token must be informed in the XML string.
        Parameters:
        context - Application context.
        Returns:
        String with the value of the project in AllIn token.

      • md5

        public static java.lang.String md5(java.lang.String value)
        For questions regarding the MD5 MD5 https://pt.wikipedia.org/wiki/MD5
        Parameters:
        value - Value that will be generated MD5
        Returns:
        MD5 value

        public static java.lang.String currentDate(java.lang.String format)
        Parameters:
        format - Data forma (ex: "yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss")
        Returns:
        the date according to the format
